trans-unit.source: Helps to secure another implementation of <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> by wrapping the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> object and restricting the resources that the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> has access to.
trans-unit.target: Consente di proteggere un'altra implementazione di <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref> eseguendo il wrapping di <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref> oggetto e per limitare le risorse che sottostante <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref> ha accesso a.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> class is the default resolver for all classes in the <xref:System.Xml> namespace.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>classe è il sistema di risoluzione predefinito per tutte le classi di <xref:System.Xml>spazio dei nomi.</xref:System.Xml> </xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>

trans-unit.source: It is used to load XML documents and to resolve external resources such as entities, DTDs or schemas, and import or include directives.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzato per il caricamento dei documenti XML e per risolvere risorse esterne, ad esempio entità, le definizioni DTD o schemi, importare o includere direttive.

trans-unit.source: You can override this default by specifying the <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> object to use.
trans-unit.target: È possibile eseguire l'override di questa impostazione predefinita, specificando il <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>oggetto da usare.</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to restrict the resources that the underlying <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> can access, you can use an XmlSecureResolver object.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se si desidera limitare le risorse che sottostante <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>possono accedere, è possibile utilizzare un oggetto di XmlSecureResolver.</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>

trans-unit.source: XmlSecureResolver wraps around a concrete implementation of <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> and restricts the resources that the underlying <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> has access to.
trans-unit.target: Esegue il wrapping di XmlSecureResolver un'implementazione concreta di <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>e limita le risorse che sottostante <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>ha accesso a.</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> </xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>

trans-unit.source: For example, XmlSecureResolver has the ability to prohibit cross-domain redirection, which occurs from an embedded Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) reference.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, XmlSecureResolver ha la possibilità di impedire il reindirizzamento tra domini, generato da un riferimento Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) incorporato.

trans-unit.source: When you construct an XmlSecureResolver object, you provide a valid <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> implementation along with a URL, an instance of an evidence object, or a permission set, which is used by the XmlSecureResolver to determine security.
trans-unit.target: Quando si costruisce un oggetto XmlSecureResolver, fornire un valore valido <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>implementazione insieme a un URL, un'istanza di un oggetto di prova o di un set di autorizzazioni utilizzato per determinare da XmlSecureResolver.</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>

trans-unit.source: Either a <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet?displayProperty=fullName> is generated or the existing one is used and <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is called on it to help secure the underlying <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>.
trans-unit.target: In un <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet?displayProperty=fullName>viene generato o esistente viene utilizzato uno e <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>viene chiamato in modo da proteggere sottostante <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> </xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.PermissionSet?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > XmlSecureResolver objects can contain sensitive information such as user credentials.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > XmlSecureResolver oggetti possono contenere informazioni sensibili quali le credenziali utente.

trans-unit.source: You should be careful when caching XmlSecureResolver objects and should not pass the XmlSecureResolver object to an untrusted component.
trans-unit.target: È necessario prestare attenzione quando la memorizzazione nella cache di XmlSecureResolver oggetti e non passare l'oggetto di XmlSecureResolver a un componente non attendibile.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > There are differences in the security infrastructure for code running on the .NET Framework common language runtime (CLR) and for code running on the CLR that is integrated within Microsoft SQL Server 2005.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Vi sono differenze nell'infrastruttura di sicurezza per il codice in esecuzione in .NET Framework common language runtime (CLR) e per il codice eseguito in CLR a integrato in Microsoft SQL Server 2005.

trans-unit.source: This can lead to cases where code developed for the .NET Framework CLR operates differently when used on the SQL Server integrated CLR.
trans-unit.target: Questo può causare ai casi in cui il codice sviluppato per CLR di .NET Framework funziona in modo diverso quando utilizzato in SQL Server integrato CLR.

trans-unit.source: One of these differences affects the XmlSecureResolver class when you have evidence that is based on a URL (that is, when you use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.CreateEvidenceForUrl%28System.String%29> method or the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%2A> constructor).
trans-unit.target: Una di queste differenze riguarda la classe di XmlSecureResolver quando si ha la prova basata su un URL (ovvero, quando si utilizza il <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.CreateEvidenceForUrl%28System.String%29>metodo o <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%2A>costruttore).</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.CreateEvidenceForUrl%28System.String%29>

trans-unit.source: The policy resolution mechanism of the SQL Server integrated CLR does not use the <xref:System.Security.Policy.Url> or <xref:System.Security.Policy.Zone> information.
trans-unit.target: I criteri di risoluzione CLR integrato meccanismo di SQL Server non utilizza il <xref:System.Security.Policy.Url>o <xref:System.Security.Policy.Zone>informazioni.</xref:System.Security.Policy.Zone> </xref:System.Security.Policy.Url>

trans-unit.source: Instead, it grants permissions based on the GUID that the server adds when assemblies are loaded.
trans-unit.target: Al contrario, vengono concesse le autorizzazioni in base al GUID che viene aggiunto quando gli assembly vengono caricati.

trans-unit.source: When you use the XmlSecureResolver in the SQL Server integrated CLR, provide any required evidence directly by using a specified <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>.
trans-unit.target: Quando si utilizza XmlSecureResolver in SQL Server CLR integrato, fornire eventuali prove richieste direttamente tramite un <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> specificato

trans-unit.source: To use a secure resolver 1.
trans-unit.target: Per utilizzare un sistema di risoluzione 1 sicura.

trans-unit.source: Create an XmlSecureResolver with the correct permission set.
trans-unit.target: Creare un XmlSecureResolver con set di autorizzazioni corretto.

trans-unit.source: Create an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings> object that uses the XmlSecureResolver object.
trans-unit.target: Creare un <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings>oggetto che utilizza l'oggetto di XmlSecureResolver.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings>

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#5a](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_1.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#5a](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_1.cs)] 3.
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples 5a #](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_1.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples 5a #](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_1.cs) ] 3.

trans-unit.source: Pass the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings> object to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A> method when you're creating the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object.
trans-unit.target: Passare il <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings>dell'oggetto per il <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A>metodo quando si crea il <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>oggetto.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings>

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#5b](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_2.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#5b](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_2.cs)] ## To restrict access by using a URL Use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.String%29> constructor to create an XmlSecureResolver object that is allowed to access your local intranet site only.
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples&5;b #](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_2.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples&5;b #](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_2.cs) ] # # per limitare l'accesso utilizzando un URL di <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.String%29>costruttore per creare un oggetto di XmlSecureResolver che è consentito accedere solo al sito intranet locale.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.String%29>

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#3](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_3.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#3](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_3.cs)] ## To restrict access by using a permission set 1.
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[N. 3 XmlSecureResolver_Samples](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_3.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples n. 3](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_3.cs) ] # # per limitare l'accesso con autorizzazione di una set di 1.

trans-unit.source: Create a <xref:System.Net.WebPermission> object.
trans-unit.target: Creare un <xref:System.Net.WebPermission>oggetto.</xref:System.Net.WebPermission>

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4a](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_4.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4a](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_4.cs)] 2.
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples 4a #](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_4.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples 4a #](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_4.cs) ] 2.

trans-unit.source: Specify the URLs that you want to allow access to.
trans-unit.target: Specificare gli URL che si desidera consentire l'accesso a.

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4b](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_5.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4b](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_5.cs)] 3.
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples 4b #](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_5.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples 4b #](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_5.cs) ] 3.

trans-unit.source: Add the web permissions to the <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> object.
trans-unit.target: Aggiungere le autorizzazioni web per il <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>oggetto.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4c](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_6.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4c](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_6.cs)] 4.
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[C# 4 XmlSecureResolver_Samples](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_6.vb)][!code-cs[c# 4 XmlSecureResolver_Samples](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_6.cs) ] 4.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%29> constructor to create an XmlSecureResolver object by using the permission set.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%29>costruttore per creare un oggetto di XmlSecureResolver utilizzando il set di autorizzazioni.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%29>

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4d](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_7.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4d](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_7.cs)] See the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%2A> reference page for another example.
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[D XmlSecureResolver_Samples](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_7.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples n.&4; d](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_7.cs) ] vedere il <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%2A>pagina di riferimento per un altro esempio.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: To restrict access by using evidence You can restrict access by using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.Policy.Evidence%29> constructor and specifying <xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence>.
trans-unit.target: Per limitare l'accesso mediante un'evidenza è possibile limitare l'accesso utilizzando il <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.Policy.Evidence%29>costruttore e specificando <xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence>.</xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence> </xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.Policy.Evidence%29>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence> is used to create the <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> that is applied to the underlying <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence>È possibile creare <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>applicato a sottostante <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> </xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> </xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence>

trans-unit.source: The XmlSecureResolver calls <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A> on the created <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> before opening any resources.
trans-unit.target: Le chiamate di XmlSecureResolver <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A>sul creato <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>prima di aprire alcuna risorsa.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> </xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: Here are some common scenarios and the type of evidence to provide for each: - If you are working in a fully trusted environment, use your assembly to create the evidence: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_8.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_8.cs)] - If you are working in a semi-trusted environment, you have code or data coming from an outside source, and you know the origin of the outside source and have a verifiable URI, use the URI to create the evidence: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_9.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_9.cs)] - If you are working in a semi-trusted environment and you have code or data coming from an outside source, but you don't know the origin of the outside source, either: Set the `evidence` parameter to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Ecco alcuni scenari comuni e il tipo di evidenza da fornire per ognuno:: se si lavora in un ambiente completamente attendibile, utilizzare l'assembly per creare l'evidenza: [!code-vb [XmlSecureResolver_Samples](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_8.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_8.cs) ] -se si lavora in un ambiente parzialmente attendibile, si dispone di codice o dati provenienti da un'origine esterna e si conosce l'origine dell'origine esterna e si dispone di un URI verificabile , usare l'URI per creare l'evidenza: [!code-vb [XmlSecureResolver_Samples n.&2;](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_9.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples n.&2;](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_9.cs) ] : se si lavora in un ambiente parzialmente attendibile e si dispone di codice o dati provenienti da un'origine esterna, ma non si conosce l'origine dell'origine esterna, ovvero: impostare il `evidence` parametro `null`.

trans-unit.source: This allows no access to resources.
trans-unit.target: In questo modo nessun accesso alle risorse.

trans-unit.source: -or- If your application requires some access to resources, request evidence from the caller.
trans-unit.target: - oppure - se l'applicazione richiede l'accesso alle risorse, richiedere l'evidenza dal chiamante.

trans-unit.source: To use the secure resolver to load an XSLT style sheet 1.
trans-unit.target: Per utilizzare il resolver sicura per caricare un foglio di stile XSLT 1.

trans-unit.source: Create an XmlSecureResolver with the correct permission set.
trans-unit.target: Creare un XmlSecureResolver con set di autorizzazioni corretto.

trans-unit.source: Pass the XmlSecureResolver to the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Passare a XmlSecureResolver il <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A>

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#6](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_10.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#6](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_10.cs)]
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[N.&6; XmlSecureResolver_Samples](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_10.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples&6; ](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_10.cs)]

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref> class with the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> and <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> specified.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref> classe con il <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> specificato.

trans-unit.source: The XML resolver that is wrapped by the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Resolver XML di cui è stato eseguito il wrapping di <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The permission set to apply to the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il set di autorizzazioni da applicare al sottostante <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref> calls the <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method on the permission set before calling the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*> method on the underlying XML resolver.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref> chiamate di <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> metodo sull'autorizzazione impostata prima di chiamare il <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*>metodo sul resolver XML sottostante.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref> class with the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> and <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Evidence"></xref> specified.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref> classe con il <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Evidence"> </xref> specificato.

trans-unit.source: Here are some possible scenarios and the type of evidence to provide for each scenario: - If you are working in a fully trusted environment, use your assembly to create the evidence: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/74601da4-12bd-44fe-a117-_1.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/74601da4-12bd-44fe-a117-_1.cs)] - If you are working in a semi-trusted environment, you have code or data coming from an outside source, and you know the origin of the outside source and have a verifiable URI, use the URI to create the evidence: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/74601da4-12bd-44fe-a117-_2.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/74601da4-12bd-44fe-a117-_2.cs)] - If you are working in a semi-trusted environment and you have code or data coming from an outside source, but you don't know the origin of the outside source, either: Set the `evidence` parameter to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Ecco alcuni possibili scenari e il tipo di evidenza da fornire per ogni scenario:: se si lavora in un ambiente completamente attendibile, utilizzare l'assembly per creare l'evidenza: [!code-vb [XmlSecureResolver_Samples](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/74601da4-12bd-44fe-a117-_1.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/74601da4-12bd-44fe-a117-_1.cs) ] -se si lavora in un ambiente parzialmente attendibile, si dispone di codice o dati provenienti da un'origine esterna e si conosce l'origine dell'origine esterna e si dispone di un URI verificabile , usare l'URI per creare l'evidenza: [!code-vb [XmlSecureResolver_Samples n.&2;](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/74601da4-12bd-44fe-a117-_2.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples n.&2;](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/74601da4-12bd-44fe-a117-_2.cs) ] : se si lavora in un ambiente parzialmente attendibile e si dispone di codice o dati provenienti da un'origine esterna, ma non si conosce l'origine dell'origine esterna, ovvero: impostare il `evidence` parametro `null`.

trans-unit.source: This allows no access to resources.
trans-unit.target: In questo modo nessun accesso alle risorse.

trans-unit.source: -or- If your application requires some access to resources, request evidence from the caller.
trans-unit.target: - oppure - se l'applicazione richiede l'accesso alle risorse, richiedere l'evidenza dal chiamante.

trans-unit.source: The XML resolver that is wrapped by the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Resolver XML di cui è stato eseguito il wrapping di <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The evidence used to create the <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> that will be applied to the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: L'evidenza utilizzata per creare il <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> che verrà applicato al sottostante <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref> calls the <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method on the created <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> before calling <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*> on the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref> chiamate di <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> metodo sul creato <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> prima di chiamare <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*>sull'oggetto sottostante <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref> class with the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> and URL provided.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref> classe con il <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref> e l'URL fornito.

trans-unit.source: The XML resolver that is wrapped by the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Resolver XML di cui è stato eseguito il wrapping di <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The URL used to create the <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> that will be applied to the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: L'URL usato per creare il <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> che verrà applicato al sottostante <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref> calls <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> on the created <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> before calling <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*> on the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref> chiamate <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> sul creato <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> prima di chiamare <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*>sull'oggetto sottostante <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*>

trans-unit.source: Creates evidence using the supplied URL.
trans-unit.target: Crea l'evidenza usando l'URL fornito.

trans-unit.source: The URL used to create the evidence.
trans-unit.target: L'URL utilizzato per creare l'evidenza.

trans-unit.source: The evidence generated from the supplied URL as defined by the default policy.
trans-unit.target: Evidenza generata dall'URL fornito, come definito dai criteri predefiniti.

trans-unit.source: Sets credentials used to authenticate web requests.
trans-unit.target: Imposta le credenziali usate per autenticare le richieste web.

trans-unit.source: The credentials to be used to authenticate web requests.
trans-unit.target: Le credenziali da utilizzare per autenticare le richieste web.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref> sets the given credentials on the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref> imposta le credenziali specificate sull'oggetto sottostante <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If this property is not set, the value defaults to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>; that is, the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref> has no user credentials.
trans-unit.target: Se questa proprietà non è impostata, il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, vale a dire il <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref> non ha credenziali utente.

trans-unit.source: Maps a URI to an object that contains the actual resource.
trans-unit.target: Esegue il mapping di un URI a un oggetto che contiene la risorsa effettiva.

trans-unit.source: This method temporarily sets the <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> created in the constructor by calling <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> before calling <xref uid="langword_csharp_GetEntity" name="GetEntity" href=""></xref> on the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> to open the resource.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo imposta temporaneamente il <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> creato nel costruttore chiamando <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> prima di chiamare <xref uid="langword_csharp_GetEntity" name="GetEntity" href=""> </xref> sull'oggetto sottostante <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref> per aprire la risorsa.

trans-unit.source: The URI that is returned from <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.ResolveUri*>.
trans-unit.target: L'URI restituito da <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.ResolveUri*>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.ResolveUri*>

trans-unit.source: Currently not used.
trans-unit.target: Attualmente non utilizzato.

trans-unit.source: The type of object to return.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo di oggetto da restituire.

trans-unit.source: The current version only returns <xref:System.IO.Stream> objects.
trans-unit.target: La versione corrente restituisce soltanto <xref:System.IO.Stream>oggetti.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The stream returned by calling <xref uid="langword_csharp_GetEntity" name="GetEntity" href=""></xref> on the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il flusso restituito chiamando <xref uid="langword_csharp_GetEntity" name="GetEntity" href=""> </xref> sull'oggetto sottostante <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If a type other than <xref:System.IO.Stream> is specified, the method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Se un tipo diverso da <xref:System.IO.Stream>è specificato, il metodo restituisce <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: ofObjectToReturn is neither nor a type.
trans-unit.target: ofObjectToReturnnon è né né tipo.

trans-unit.source: The specified URI is not an absolute URI.
trans-unit.target: L'URI specificato non è un URI assoluto.

trans-unit.source: absoluteUri is .
trans-unit.target: absoluteUriis .

trans-unit.source: There is a runtime error (for example, an interrupted server connection).
trans-unit.target: Si verifica un errore di runtime (ad esempio, una connessione server interrotto).

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously maps a URI to an object that contains the actual resource.
trans-unit.target: Esegue il mapping in modo asincrono un URI a un oggetto che contiene la risorsa effettiva.

trans-unit.source: The URI returned from <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.ResolveUri*>.
trans-unit.target: URI restituito da <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.ResolveUri*>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.ResolveUri*>

trans-unit.source: Currently not used.
trans-unit.target: Attualmente non utilizzato.

trans-unit.source: The type of object to return.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo di oggetto da restituire.

trans-unit.source: The current version only returns <xref:System.IO.Stream> objects.
trans-unit.target: La versione corrente restituisce soltanto <xref:System.IO.Stream>oggetti.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The stream returned by calling <xref uid="langword_csharp_GetEntity" name="GetEntity" href=""></xref> on the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il flusso restituito chiamando <xref uid="langword_csharp_GetEntity" name="GetEntity" href=""> </xref> sull'oggetto sottostante <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If a type other than <xref:System.IO.Stream> is specified, the method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Se un tipo diverso da <xref:System.IO.Stream>è specificato, il metodo restituisce <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Resolves the absolute URI from the base and relative URIs by calling <xref uid="langword_csharp_ResolveUri" name="ResolveUri" href=""></xref> on the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Risolve l'URI assoluto dagli URI di base e relativi chiamando <xref uid="langword_csharp_ResolveUri" name="ResolveUri" href=""> </xref> sull'oggetto sottostante <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The base URI used to resolve the relative URI.
trans-unit.target: L'URI di base usato per risolvere l'URI relativo.

trans-unit.source: The URI to resolve.
trans-unit.target: URI da risolvere.

trans-unit.source: The URI can be absolute or relative.
trans-unit.target: L'URI può essere assoluto o relativo.

trans-unit.source: If absolute, this value effectively replaces the `baseUri` value.
trans-unit.target: Se assoluto, questo valore sostituisce il `baseUri` valore.

trans-unit.source: If relative, it combines with the `baseUri` to make an absolute URI.
trans-unit.target: Se relativo, viene combinato con il `baseUri` per ottenere un URI assoluto.

trans-unit.source: The absolute URI or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the relative URI cannot be resolved (returned by calling <xref uid="langword_csharp_ResolveUri" name="ResolveUri" href=""></xref> on the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>).
trans-unit.target: L'URI assoluto o <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se non è possibile risolta l'URI relativo (restituito chiamando <xref uid="langword_csharp_ResolveUri" name="ResolveUri" href=""> </xref> sull'oggetto sottostante <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>).

trans-unit.source: relativeUri is .
trans-unit.target: relativeUriis .
